曬.definition: (of the sun) to shine on; to bask in (the sunshine); to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun; (fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share"); (coll.) to give the cold shoulder to

曬太陽.definition: to be in the sun (getting warm or sunbathing etc); to put sth in the sun (e.g. to dry it)

曬娃.definition: (coll.) to excessively share pics etc of one's child on social media; sharenting

曬客.definition: person who shares their experiences and thoughts with others on the Internet

曬照.definition: (Internet slang) to post a photo of oneself online

曬駱駝.definition: xylitol (Cantonese); see also 木糖醇[mu4 tang2 chun2]

曬黑.definition: to sunbathe; to tan; to get sunburnt; to expose unfair practices (on a consumer protection website)
